ing: 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini (white kidney) beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can dark red kidney beans, rinsed and drained
2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A refreshing blend of flavors great for summer or simple dinners! Flavors tend to blend better after time."
ins: Combine cannellini beans, garbanzo beans, kidney beans in a mixing bowl. Add onion, garlic, parsley, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper; mix well.
